title: Foggy city street with multiple braking events
caption: The red ego vehicle is driving slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.4 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet and foggy, with a crosswalk and a traffic light in the distance. There are other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road. The weather is clear, and the sky is blue.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the foggy conditions and the presence of other vehicles on the road. It is braking frequently to avoid collisions and to maintain a safe distance from the other cars. The driver is being cautious and attentive to the traffic situation, adjusting the speed and the direction of the vehicle accordingly.
